00047 class OPENMM_EXPORT CMAPTorsionForceImpl : public ForceImpl {
00048 public:
00049     CMAPTorsionForceImpl(CMAPTorsionForce& owner);
00050     ~CMAPTorsionForceImpl();
00051     void initialize(ContextImpl& context);
00052     CMAPTorsionForce& getOwner() {
00053         return owner;
00054     }
00055     void updateContextState(ContextImpl& context) {
00056         // This force field doesn't update the state directly.
00057     }
00058     double calcForcesAndEnergy(ContextImpl& context, bool includeForces, bool includeEnergy, int groups);
00059     std::map<std::string, double> getDefaultParameters() {
00060         return std::map<std::string, double>(); // This force field doesn't define any parameters.
00061     }
00062     std::vector<std::string> getKernelNames();
00066     static void calcMapDerivatives(int size, const std::vector<double>& energy, std::vector<std::vector<double> >& c);
00067 private:

00070 };
